analysis.description:
BasicToken.totalSupply_ (/unique_chucks/3/0xf53c580bc4065405bc649cc077ff4f2f28528f4b.sol#161-162) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- totalSupply (/unique_chucks/3/0xf53c580bc4065405bc649cc077ff4f2f28528f4b.sol#166-171)

BasicToken.availableSupply_ (/unique_chucks/3/0xf53c580bc4065405bc649cc077ff4f2f28528f4b.sol#162-165) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- availableSupply (/unique_chucks/3/0xf53c580bc4065405bc649cc077ff4f2f28528f4b.sol#171-174)
Bittwatt._tokenAllocator (/unique_chucks/3/0xf53c580bc4065405bc649cc077ff4f2f28528f4b.sol#508-509) is never initialized. It is used in:

EscrowContract.executeBeneficiary (/unique_chucks/3/0xf53c580bc4065405bc649cc077ff4f2f28528f4b.sol#479-487) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-ERC20(token_).transfer(beneficiary_,amount_) (/unique_chucks/3/0xf53c580bc4065405bc649cc077ff4f2f28528f4b.sol#486-487)

EscrowContract.executeCreator (/unique_chucks/3/0xf53c580bc4065405bc649cc077ff4f2f28528f4b.sol#487-492) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-ERC20(token_).transfer(creator_,amount_) (/unique_chucks/3/0xf53c580bc4065405bc649cc077ff4f2f28528f4b.sol#492)

Bittwatt.setTokenAllocator._tokenAllocator (local variable @ /unique_chucks/3/0xf53c580bc4065405bc649cc077ff4f2f28528f4b.sol#515-516) shadows:
	- Bittwatt._tokenAllocator (state variable @ /unique_chucks/3/0xf53c580bc4065405bc649cc077ff4f2f28528f4b.sol#508-509)

Bittwatt.setTotalSupply.totalSupply (local variable @ /unique_chucks/3/0xf53c580bc4065405bc649cc077ff4f2f28528f4b.sol#540) shadows:
